attributes.action: Give all speeding and parking fines, congestion charges to charity
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If the authorities are serious about using speed cameras, parking fines etc. as tools to improve road safety and other issues, then all net profits from these tools should be given to charity to prove to a sceptical public that the motive is not revenue generation. Would we see a proliferation of speed cameras if revenues went to charity?
